definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the time period between late afternoon and nightfall, typically used to describe the latter part of the day when the sun begins to set. It is often utilized to indicate the beginning of the evening or to denote the time when people typically relax, unwind, and engage in leisure activities after a day's work.

examples.german: Am Abend gehe ich ins Kino.
examples.english: In the evening, I go to the cinema.

examples.german: Wir haben uns am Abend getroffen.

examples.english: In the evenings, I like to read books.
